title: Muse no Gakuen de Aou
original_name: ミューズの学園で逢おう
sinopse:
Outstanding student Tadafumi Hanai of Misonoi Campus has to tutor Still's lead member, Ohtsuki Yuu, who is Hanai-kun's schoolmate. A scholar vs. a star!

(Source: MU)

Included one-shots:
Volume 1: Warui Yume (Bad Dream)
Volume 2: Ori (Cage); Areno no Gotoku (Like the Barren Wasteland)
